title: Katarina Unlocked Statue not shipped yet?
body: When will the Katarina Unlocked statue ship? I purchased it 2 weeks ago and payment has gone through. The website says it should ship within 2 weeks, but it has now been over 16 days (purchased on the 10th).

replies.body:
[The webpage](https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/collectibles/statues/katarina-unlocked.html) specifically says the following:

> *"This item **typically** ships within 2 weeks from purchase.*

I'm guessing we had to give the shipping Poros the holiday off to spend it with their Poro families. If you don't see it ship in the next week, I'd reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can see what's going on.
